sentences.sContent: My first novel was rejected by six publishers. In the meantime I had written a play.
sentences.sCn: 我的第一部小说遭到六家出版商的拒绝。其间我又完成了一部戏剧。

sentences.sContent: The doctor will be here soon. In the meantime, try and relax.
sentences.sCn: 医生很快就来，现在尽量放松一下。

sentences.sContent: I'll contact them soon. Meantime don't tell them I'm back.
sentences.sCn: 我会尽快和他们联系。在此期间，不要告诉他们我回来了。

trans.tranOther: in the period of time between two times or two events
